ImplementedSecurityControls.AccessControl: The onlyOwner modifier restricts critical function access to the contract owner.
ImplementedSecurityControls.OpenToPublicCheck: The isOpenToPublic modifier protects functions to ensure they are executed only when openToPublic is true.
ImplementedSecurityControls.RealUserVerification: The onlyRealPeople modifier limits access to externally owned accounts.

FallbackFunctionality.FallbackFunction: Allows receiving Ether directly through a payable fallback function without specific handling.
